page.title: 18HOLCOMBE HUNT AND GAME SHOW
page.content: The{Holcombe Hunt}is one of the oldest in the country, being established over 300 years ago, when the district was almost entirely forest. The kennels were formerly in Holcombe but are now at Kirkless, Tottington. The{Holcombe Old English Game Fowl } Club is claimed to be one of the oldest clubs of its kind in the country. On{New Years Day}each year it stages a game fowl show, which attracts entries from all over the country. The event used to be held at The Shoulder of Mutton Hotel in {Holcombe village}but this venue became too small and so the show moved to The Rose and Crown Hotel which also became too small to hold this popular event.It is now held in The Old Dun Horse.
